ygData.subject: Sat Feb 5 EQ Chili-fest R-L event!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of you who live in or near Milwaukee, WI... Saturday Feb 5 come to my house for a EQ gathering and Chili eating event 11am til ??? I spoke to Xaria,
ygData.messageBody:
For those of you who live in or near Milwaukee, WI...

Saturday Feb 5 come to my house for a EQ gathering and Chili eating event
11am til ???

I spoke to Xaria, Balandrus, Dazzler, Triston, Donna and hope Oren (Vezer)
sees this too (Innoruuk server people.) Actually, anyone who can get there
from where ever you are is invited and welcome. Hint, hint: Japhia, Mac and
other Michigan, IL, IN, IA & MN players. My place is easy access from the
interstate and there's a good variety of motels nearby if you wanna
overnight.

My game room has 2 EQ pc's networked and sharing 128k ISDN so I think we
could add a couple more if you want to bring your stuff. Also, I have 2
analog telco lines that could be used. And if some one has AD&D or other
'pen & paper' rpg, I'd love to see how that works too!

Everyone is invited and welcome - drop me an e mail to: jgs@... and
I will send you my phone number, directions & a map and that will also help
me know how many can actually make it.

Sylly Songsynger

p.s. this started as an idea for some local friends who play on Innoruuk
server but if any EQ players are in/near Milwaukee and want to drop by -
everyone is welcome!
